ai-patthana17.13:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.13:1.1_0: for the sake of unskillful things or unskillful.
ai-patthana17.13:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana17.13:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.13:2.1_0: Isn’t answered by middling is a cause or reason.
ai-patthana17.13:3.1_0: A skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to a higher, or an unwholesome quality.
